name: Mental Asylum VR
description: Immersive horror experience. Try to get out of it alive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 with Video Output: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 Additional Notes: 1x USB 2.0
recommended_requirements: Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 980 or better
